short_summary: Testing of TMA buttons, tender recall and cancellation
full_summary:
### UAT Tender 5: Recall and Cancel

#### Tender Details

* Reference Number: SSC-23-00013137:T
* Solicitation Number: BPM011409/13137
* Publication Date: April 24, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: July 13, 2001 09:00 AM (Expired)
* Contracting Entity: Shared Services Canada
* End-User Entities: Shared Services Canada
* Regions of Opportunity: Manitoba
* Regions of Delivery: British Columbia

#### Tender Description

This tender was created for testing purposes. It aims to assess the functionality of buttons within the TMA. The tender involves recalling a published tender overnight, obtaining approval from the PA, and subsequently cancelling the tender. 

#### Contact Information

* Name: First Last
* Phone: 613-999-7777
* Fax: 613-999-7777
* Address:
	+ 325781 Fake Street, Ottawa, Ontario K0A 0C3
* Email: Not provided

#### Notice Information

* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive – Selective tendering
* Trade Agreements: Canada-Korea Telecommunications Equipment Agreement (CKTEA)
* UNSPSC: Not applicable
* GSIN: 5111A – Construction Site Planning
* Procurement Category: CNST
* Notice URL: Not provided

#### Attachments

None

#### Status

This tender has expired on July 13, 2001. Please note that this tender is no longer available for submission. This entry has been rewritten for improved clarity and professionalism. The original data has not undergone any alteration in the process. Note that essential information remains untouched.  
 
Let me know if you have any questions regarding this entry, or if you'd need me to make any necessary adjustments.
